document.full_text: kellogg co  reported a lower-than-expected quarterly profit, hurt by higher costs for ingredients and more spending on advertising, sending its shares down 1.6 percent on wednesday.
document.title: kellogg profit misses as price rises lag costs
lines_and_colors: kellogg co  reported a lower-than-expected quarterly profit, hurt by higher costs for ingredients and more spending on advertising, sending its shares down 1.6 percent on wednesday.
